subject: Attention:
body:
Attention:
Your urgent attention is needed immediately.
Are you the one that instructed (Jeff Douglas) from United States of
America to claim
your ATM Payment worth of US$10,500.000.00 (Ten Million Five Hundred
Thousand United States Dollars) with below information:
Jeff Douglas
3611 85th street nw lot 140  Oronoco,
Minnesota 55960 USA.
Age: 57
Phone:  507-367-2330
I attached his Passport sent to our bank, I have called the Federal Government
yesterday they told me that the are not aware.
please Confirm the receipt of this  email immediately to me and also
send us your information as follows:
(1) Your Full Name :
(2) House mailing address:
(3) Your sex, age and marital status:
(4) Phone number for conversation:
(5) Your current occupation :
Thanks
Mr. Herbert Wigwe
Group Managing Director/CEO
Access Bank Plc

subject: Re: Attention:
body:
Hello Mr. Herbert Wigwe,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite a surprise! I don't recall instructing anyone named Jeff Douglas to claim any ATM Payment on my behalf. It's interesting that he's from Minnesota, USA - I've always wanted to visit there.

Could you tell me more about how this situation came about? How did Jeff Douglas come into the picture and why does he have my name associated with him?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Alice
